plugily.projects.villagedefense.creeperattack.config

类 ConfigService

  • java.lang.Object
    • plugily.projects.villagedefense.creeperattack.config.ConfigService

  • public class ConfigService
extends java.lang.Object
    Centralized configuration service for Creeper Attack mode. Handles loading, saving, validation, and default generation.
